channel.title: Help with devolution 7
channel.description:
ok, i just recently added herblore... im not really sure what i did wrong, it was working b4... but now... everytime i use an item on another item... not just for herblore, for crafting too... i get :
Devolution 7 [fatal] - exception
and then it relogs me into the server
any help :S
another problem is changing the difficulty of NPCs... my source is Devolution 7 and the npcs dont do damage at all... how do i change that??
